title: maps
body: just wanted to ask when the normal summoners rift was coming back?? :)      {{item:2010}}

replies.body:
Greetings 1nvade.

[Riot KateyKhaos made a tweet](https://twitter.com/KateyAnthony/status/818135970293772288) earlier today saying this:

> [REMINDER] Snowdown ends Jan. 9, 2017 at 23:59 PT. Grab any last minute winter legacy content before it makes its way into the legacy vault!

Along with this if you look on the [website for the snowdown event](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/snowdown-2016), it shows that the map will go away at "January 9, 2017 at 23:59 PT"

> WINTER SUMMONER'S RIFT
> 12/14/16 - 1/9/17
> Snow returns to Summonerâ€™s Rift. Enjoy the winter landscape until January 9, 2017 at 23:59 PT in the following game modes: Co-op vs. AI, Normal Draft, and Blind Pick.

Hope this helps!

~Elam
